verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord it was You who Created the heavens Lord it was Your hand That put the stars in their place Lord it was Your voice That commands the morning Even oceans and their waves Bow at Your feet{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am Your beloved Your creation And You love me as I am You have called me chosen For Your kingdom Unashamed to call me Your own I am Your beloved.{/lang-eng}
